content: The Earth Wolf fight is a challenging one. The Wolf is large, and it hits hard, not to mention it catches fire at some points throughout the battle. Here are the attacks you can expect to see when tussling with the Earth Wolf:

The content is as follows:
The Earth Wolf fight is a challenging one. The Wolf is large, and it hits hard, not to mention it catches fire at some points throughout the battle. Here are the attacks you can expect to see when tussling with the Earth Wolf:
